qualification.英释: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject

confrontation.英释: a situation in which there is a lot of angry disagreement between two people or groups

sophisticated.英释: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

contradiction.英释: a difference between two statements, beliefs, or ideas about something that means they cannot both be true

hieroglyphics.英释: pictures and symbols used to represent words or parts of words, especially in the ancient Egyptian writing system

comprehensive.英释: including all the necessary facts, details, or problems that need to be dealt with

companionship.英释: Companionship is having someone you know and like with you, instead of being on your own

inconvenience.英释: problems caused by something which annoy or affect you

biotechnology.中释: [生物] 生物技术；[生物] 生物工艺学
biotechnology.英释: the use of living things such as cells,  bacteria  etc to make drugs, destroy waste matter etc

environmental.中释: 环境的，周围的；有关环境的
environmental.英释: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth

circumference.英释: the distance or measurement around the outside of a circle or any round shape

inexhaustible.英释: something that is inexhaustible exists in such large amounts that it can never be finished or used up

specification.英释: a detailed instruction about how a car, building, piece of equipment etc should be made

uninformative.中释: 不提供信息的；不增长见闻的
uninformative.英释: Something that is uninformative does not give you enough useful information

indispensable.中释: 不可缺少之物；必不可少的人

autobiography.英释: a book in which someone writes about their own life, or books of this type

electromagnet.中释: 电磁体，[电] 电磁铁；电磁石
electromagnet.英释: a piece of metal that becomes magnetic(= able to attract metal objects ) when an electric current is turned on

extraordinary.中释: 非凡的；特别的；离奇的；临时的；特派的
extraordinary.英释: very much greater or more impressive than usual

inconsiderate.中释: 轻率的；不顾别人的；无谋得
inconsiderate.英释: If you accuse someone of being inconsiderate, you mean that they do not take enough care over how their words or actions will affect other people

constellation.中释: [天] 星座；星群；荟萃；兴奋丛
constellation.英释: a group of stars that forms a particular pattern and has a name

sportsmanship.英释: Sportsmanship is behaviour and attitudes that show respect for the rules of a game and for the other players

perpendicular.英释: an exactly vertical position or line

Mediterranean.英释: relating to the Mediterranean Sea, or typical of the area of southern Europe around it

radioactivity.中释: 放射性；[核] 放射能力；[核] 放射现象
radioactivity.英释: the sending out of  radiation (= a form of energy )  when the  nucleus (= central part )  of an atom has broken apart

counterattack.英释: an attack you make against someone who has attacked you, in a war, sport, or argument

institutional.英释: institutional attitudes and behaviour have existed for a long time in an organization and have become accepted as normal even though they are bad

argumentative.英释: someone who is argumentative often argues or likes arguing

controversial.英释: causing a lot of disagreement, because many people have strong opinions about the subject being discussed

redevelopment.英释: the act of redeveloping an area, especially in a city

mathematician.英释: someone who studies or teaches mathematics, or is a specialist in mathematics

unforgettable.英释: an unforgettable experience, sight etc affects you so strongly that you will never forget it, especially because it is particularly good or beautiful

knowledgeable.中释: 知识渊博的，有知识的；有见识的；聪明的

multinational.英释: a large company that has offices, factories etc in many different countries

hydroelectric.中释: 水力发电的；水电治疗的
hydroelectric.英释: using water power to produce electricity

uncomfortable.英释: not feeling physically comfortable, or not making you feel comfortable

communicative.中释: 交际的；爱说话的，健谈的；无隐讳交谈的
communicative.英释: able to talk easily to other people

chrysanthemum.英释: a garden plant with large brightly coloured flowers
